meanings.definition: In a basic or essential manner.
meanings.sent1: She understood the concept elementally, grasping the fundamental idea easily.
meanings.sent2: The machine operated elementally, performing its basic functions without any issues.
meanings.sent3: He tried to cook elementally, but ended up burning the simplest dish!
meanings.sent4: Her kindness shone elementally, touching everyone's hearts in a pure and simple way.
meanings.sent5: The music resonated elementally, stirring emotions deep within the listeners.

meanings.definition: Relating to the basic or essential parts of something.
meanings.sent1: The elementally designed chair focused on functionality over aesthetics.
meanings.sent2: The elementally important components were carefully assembled to ensure the system's efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The elementally themed party only had basic decorations, but everyone had a great time!
meanings.sent4: His elementally strong presence commanded attention in any room he entered.
meanings.sent5: The elementally structured building stood out for its simplicity and practicality.
